title: Beautiful views from your new 2 Bed, 2 Bath! 1200 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['Shadow Lake', 'Bedroom: 2 | Bathroom: 2', 'Square Footage: 1200 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1701', 'show contact info', 'Community Description', 'Shadow Lake Apartments is a great place to call "home".', 'Please contact us today for more information, or stop by so a member of our bi-lingual staff can show you around our community.', 'Community Amenities', '− Business Center', '− Cable/Satellite Available', '− Central Air', '− Clubhouse', '− Extended living room area', '− Fitness Center', '− Picnic Area with Grill', '− Smoke Free', '− Sparkling Swimming Pool', '− Tennis Courts', '− Clothes Care Center', '− Lake on Site', '− Laundry Facilities', '− MARTA Access', '− Pet Care', '− Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '− Scenic Lake', '− Se Habla Espanol', '− Walking Distance to Pleasantdale Park', '− Wooded Views', 'Unit Features', '− Air Conditioning', '− Breakfast Bar', '− Ceiling Fans', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal', '− Patio/Balcony', '− Refrigerator/Ice Maker', '− Sunroom', '− Walk-In Closets', '− Cable/Satellite Available', '− Extended living room area', '− Fireplace in Select Units', '− Fully Equipped Kitchens', '− Hardwood Floors', '− High Speed Internet Access', '−', 'In Unit Washer & Dryer', '− Upgrade Unit', '− Vaulted Ceilings in Select Units', '− Views', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '3515 Pleasantdale Rd.', 'Doraville, GA 30340', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Additional Details', 'Pet Policy:', 'We accept 2 pets with a max weight of 50lbs.', 'and a pet fee of $300 and a monthly pet rent of $15.', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '1BD2966F86C243C']
